info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 8:35PM CDT until April 22 at 6:20AM CDT by NWS Wichita KS
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Wichita KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas...
Neosho River near Erie affecting Neosho County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Neosho River near Erie.
* WHEN...From late tonight to Tuesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Expect flooding of lowlands along the vicinity of the river.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 24.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 29.8 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet.
info.instruction:
Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don't drown.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 845 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO TUESDAY MORNING
